about_the_game:
Introducing the MONTHLY MURDERERS - SERIES 1 killer pack! A collected pack of the past 6 months of Slayaway Camp monthly murderers. Each killer comes with their own special effects, kill animation, and psychotic tendencies. Purchase of this DLC will instantly grant you permanent access to each of the following killers...

PRESIDENT SKULLFACE

Wanna see a *really* scary presidential candidate? Comes with his super special kill: FREEDOMED!

KILLER CANDY CANE

Don't let his minty fresh breath lull you into complacency! Comes with their super special kill: MINTY FRESH!

GELATINOUS CUBE

A perfect ten feet on each side, it secretes an anesthetizing slime and engulfs victims whole. Comes with his super special kill: DIGESTED!

MR. TOPHAT JONES

He's gonna eat every last one of them Strawberry Smiggles... because... and then they'll be in his stomach. Comes with its super special kill: RAINBOWED!

THE PLAGUE DOCTOR

After emerging from the darkest of dungeons she possessed a hatred for anything happy. Comes with her super special kill: MALPRACTICE!

DEMI LICH

Ready to suck on some souls. Comes with its super special kill: SOUL'D OUT!

Introducing the MONTHLY MURDERERS - SERIES 1 killer pack! A collected pack of the past 6 months of Slayaway Camp monthly murderers. Each killer comes with their own special effects, kill animation, and psychotic tendencies. Purchase of this DLC will instantly grant you permanent access to each of the following killers...

PRESIDENT SKULLFACE

Wanna see a *really* scary presidential candidate? Comes with his super special kill: FREEDOMED!

KILLER CANDY CANE

Don't let his minty fresh breath lull you into complacency! Comes with their super special kill: MINTY FRESH!

GELATINOUS CUBE

A perfect ten feet on each side, it secretes an anesthetizing slime and engulfs victims whole. Comes with his super special kill: DIGESTED!

MR. TOPHAT JONES

He's gonna eat every last one of them Strawberry Smiggles... because... and then they'll be in his stomach. Comes with its super special kill: RAINBOWED!

THE PLAGUE DOCTOR

After emerging from the darkest of dungeons she possessed a hatred for anything happy. Comes with her super special kill: MALPRACTICE!

DEMI LICH

Ready to suck on some souls. Comes with its super special kill: SOUL'D OUT!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.
